text: I'm Elizabeth Schmidt I'm a senior
recruitment manager with AWS the thing
that I think people often think is that
you have to have a very very specific
background in order to be able to join
the talent acquisition organization
within AWS and that's not necessarily
the truth we actually love diversity and
you know diverse perspectives diverse
backgrounds we have team members that
have joined from very operational
backgrounds we have people that have
come from a computer science background
we have probably the bulk of us have
come from some kind of a an HR
background whether we studied it or we
previously worked in HR or recruitment
but the the bottom line is it can be
pretty much anything as long as you have
that desire to work with talented people
to find them have their curiosity leave
now Stern unturned to find exceptional
talent for AWS it's that passion for
finding talented people and then really
being obsessed with their experience and
taking them through the Journey helping
them preparing them and taking the
journey with them
